title: GuidanceResponse data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/' This is a GuidanceResponse resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

requestIdentifier.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Identifier' An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Identifier' Allows a service to provide  unique, business identifiers for the response.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

moduleUri.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/' An identifier, CodeableConcept or canonical reference to the guidance that was requested.

_moduleUri.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

moduleCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/' An identifier, CodeableConcept or canonical reference to the guidance that was requested.

_moduleCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

moduleCodeableConcept.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

subject.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

encounter.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

occurrenceDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/dateTime' A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month).  If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored.                 Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_occurrenceDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

performer.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

reasonCode.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' Describes the reason for the guidance response in coded or textual form.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

reasonReference.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' Indicates the reason the request was initiated. This is typically provided as a parameter to the evaluation and echoed by the service, although for some use cases, such as subscription- or event-based scenarios, it may provide an indication of the cause for the response.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

note.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Annotation' Provides a mechanism to communicate additional information about the response.

items.description: A  text note which also  contains information about who made the statement and when.

evaluationMessage.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' Messages resulting from the evaluation of the artifact or artifacts. As part of evaluating the request, the engine may produce informational or warning messages. These messages will be provided by this element.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

outputParameters.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

result.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

dataRequirement.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/DataRequirement' If the evaluation could not be completed due to lack of information, or additional information would potentially result in a more accurate response, this element will a description of the data required in order to proceed with the evaluation. A subsequent request to the service should include this data.

items.description: Describes a required data item for evaluation in terms of the type of data, and optional code or date-based filters of the data.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'GuidanceResponse'
